attributes.action: Persuade the Leeds Teaching Hospitals to name the new oncology wing after the late Jane Tomlinson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The late Jane Tomlinson spent her last seven years raising over a million pounds for cancer charities. As she was a member of staff at the Leeds Teaching Hospitals NHS Trust when she was diagnosed with breast cancer, we feel the Trust should honour her by naming the new oncology wing after her.
